# File.ReadTextFile method

Read file as string.

```csharp
public static Tuple<bool, string> ReadTextFile(string filename)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| filename | filename to file to read. |

## Return Value

true if file is read &#x7C; data as string.
